meanings.definition: To recognize the full worth of something
meanings.sent1: I appreciate your help in understanding the math problem.
meanings.sent2: I appreciate the beauty of nature when I go for a walk in the park.
meanings.sent3: I appreciate how my cat always greets me at the door when I come home.
meanings.sent4: Just like a fine wine, some things appreciate with age.
meanings.sent5: I truly appreciate the effort you put into making this delicious meal.

meanings.sent1: I appreciate your kind words during a difficult time.

meanings.sent3: I appreciate how my dog gets excited every time I pick up his leash.

meanings.sent5: I deeply appreciate the opportunity to learn new things every day.

meanings.definition: To increase in value over time
meanings.sent1: I hope that my antique collection will appreciate in value over the years.
meanings.sent2: Real estate properties in this area tend to appreciate significantly.
meanings.sent3: I appreciate how my savings account slowly appreciates with interest.
meanings.sent4: Just like a rare painting, some investments appreciate greatly over time.
